arts.sum: VinÃ­cius JÃºnior apologised to Brazil's fans after their 1-0 defeat in Paraguay in World Cup qualifying, admitting it's a "difficult time" for the team.

arts.ttl: Former Manchester United star who won the Premier League four times is ordered to JAIL in Brazil over Â£45,000 row
arts.sum: A former Manchester United midfielder has been threatened with prison time over his reported failure to pay child maintenance.

arts.ttl: Brazilian media react to Gabriel Magalhaesâ€™ â€˜mistakeâ€™ in Brazilâ€™s shock 1-0 defeat to Paraguay last night
Brazil manager risks repeating Jurgen Klopp blunder with bold 2026 World Cup prediction
arts.sum: Brazil were knocked out of this summer's Copa America at the quarter-final stage but Dorival Junior is certain that his side will go much further at the 2026 World Cup

arts.ttl: Under-fire Brazil boss makes bold prediction
arts.sum: Brazil boss Dorival Junior has reacted to pressure around his position by insisting the South Americans will reach the 2026 World Cup final. Brazil currently sit fourth in the CONMEBOL 2026 FIFA World Cup qualification table after a mixed start to their campaign. The record five-time world champions have lost three of their opening seven [â€¦] The post Under-fire Brazil boss makes bold prediction first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: When is Paraguay - Brazil? Times, how to watch on TV, stream online
arts.sum: Brazil have famously never missed a World Cup and are extremely unlikely not to qualify for the next edition in the United States, Canada and Mexico in 2026 despite a poor start to qualification, which saw them lose three of their opening six games. Incredibly, Paraguay have only scored one goal in their first seven qualifiers, but are in the playoff spot after conceding just three times.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid, Brazil star Rodrygo admits disappointment after Ballon d'Or snub
arts.sum: Real Madrid attacker Rodrygo admits that 'he was upset' when learning that he did not feature on a 30-player shortlist for the 2024 Ballon d'Or.

arts.ttl: Rodrygo: Brazil need Neymar to win '26 World Cup
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Rodrygo has said that Brazil need Neymar if they are to chase a record sixth World Cup in 2026.

arts.ttl: Wolves transfer news: Brazil international Andre speaks on deadline-day move from Fluminense
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers midfielder Andre praises former club Fluminense for allowing him to join the Premier League club.

arts.ttl: Rodrygo reveals how he will help Estevao after making Brazil debut
arts.sum: Rodrygo has vowed to pass his experience onto Estevao after the future Chelsea forward made his senior Brazil debut. Real Madrid winger Rodrygo, though still 23, is considered one of the more senior players of the Brazil setup nowadays.
